message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to both of us.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $850000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $850000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $880000. This would be a win-win, allowing you to get the product at a good price and me to still earn a respectable amount. Let's meet in the middle!

I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am comfortable with an offer of $865000. I believe this strikes a balance between fairness and practicality for both parties.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $865000 is still quite a bit lower than what I need. I'm willing to go down to $875000. This is a fair compromise that gets us closer to an agreement. If you're not able to meet me there, I may need to explore other options.

Alice, thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate. I've carefully considered our previous discussions, and I am willing to offer $870000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise that respects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
